profile:
The Home of Satisfied Customers!

Flooring Liquidators is your one stop , full package solution when it comes to flooring. With our expanding retail locations, large purchasing power and connections with local and foreign flooring manufacturers, we are able to offer our customers top quality flooring at the most competitive prices.

The Largest Flooring Selection

Flooring Liquidators carries a wide array of Canadian and Exotic flooring products. We’ve earned a high reputation with our products and services, and we’ve been the go-to retail store for many homeowners, contractors, realtors, designers, and builders.

Our tagline is ‘Everything is on Sale’ because of our affordable prices. We offer no compromise on our flooring products, since everything is backed by a manufacturer’s warranty to offer you peace of mind.

Visit one of our Showrooms Near you!

Flooring Liquidators currently has 13 showrooms and is rapidly expanding with the aim of becoming a dominant force in the flooring industry. Our service areas are all of the GTA, Toronto, Brampton, Hamilton, Oshawa, Mississauga, Newmarket, Barrie, London, and Ottawa. Contact us now for a location near you.

profile:
The Premier Flooring Group provides all things flooring - both residential and commercial... From hardwoods to luxury planks, from Carpet to Porcelain Tile, from Marmoleum to sheet vinyl, we offer it all. Over the years our Homestars rating has always been at the top of the class regarding refinishing of hardwoods and stairs. With our reach we can also recap your stairs with new solid birch, maple or oak treads and risers, custom stained and treated!

We service a wide area throughout Ottawa and the Valley. We can have an initial discussion via the telephone then bring applicable  samples to you! Our needs based approach will assist you in making your decision easier and informed. We will discuss the features and benefits of each selection - a Pros and Cons checklist if you will. Once you've made your decision, we will implement your strategy consisting of rip out and disposal, preparation of the new floor area, the actual installation of your new floor and a follow up on maintaining your new floors.

We can assist with full bathroom remodels, including the ditra shower system, new taps and sinks, sinks and tubs, shower pans and tiles, new vanity and even, paint. 

Our rates are competitive because of our low overhead costs. We are a family owned  and operated company. We bring you years of experience, work closely with area restoration companies on insurance damage claims all while maintaining expected High Standards, Ethics, Reliability, and High Quality.

We provide:

    Hardwood floor supply and installation - both solid and engineered
    Ceramic and Porcelain Tile supply and installation - Wall and Floor
    Vinyl Products like Sheet Vinyl and luxury plank (no longer considered vinyl plank) - Supply and installations
    Smartstrand Carpet from Mohawk - Supply and installation 
    General Renovations - rec rooms and bathrooms
    Sub Contracting services for restoration companies 
    Commercial flooring  - Marmoleum type flooring - supplied and installed

Welcome to E. Guerra Construction 

If you want to transform your home into something extraordinary but can’t find the missing ingredient to bring your vision to life, look no further. E. Guerra Construction offers the remodeling and construction services you can count on. Sooner or later, even the nicest home will need fixing-up due to wear and tear, and a renovation project is a perfect opportunity to express your creativity and update your home’s look. With our professional home improvement services, we can take on all the remodeling projects that you’ve wanted to do.

profile:
At Kingdom we believe that quality and excellence is the key to successfully serving our Customers. Our Royal Team will help you choose the right quality product to meet any of your budget needs. From there, our Team completes every task spotless to your satisfaction.

We sell and install a variety of products from flooring to ceiling. We carry the best and most reliable of brands when it comes to our vinyl, laminate, hardwood, ceramic, carpet and window coverings.

For years, Kingdom Flooring has been at the forefront of Flooring Services serving the Cities of Ottawa, Gatineau, Cornwall, Brockville, Kingston, Pembroke and all other surrounding Townships.

All of our dedicated staff works hard to ensure our customers have an enjoyable experience at Kingdom Floors and Decor. We pride ourselves on customer satisfaction. We will work with you to navigate our carefully selected products in order to achieve a design that is practical and stylish. Whether you are visiting our showroom, working on a full renovation project, or designing your new space we will help you every step of the way.

profile:
JAX Flooring specializes in the installation of Hardwood, Engineered Hardwood, Laminates and Luxury Vinyl Planks (LVP) and Luxury Vinyl Tile (LVT). We have access to a multitude of products at contractor pricing including Canadian Oak, Maple, and engineered hardwood in all sizes and colours. Quality is paramount and that's what we strive to achieve. As a small 2 man crew we are there every step of the way from choosing the material to installing it. We spend the extra time to make sure our customers are 100% satisfied.

About Us
 JAX flooring is a small business that focuses on quality and customer service. Myself (Jackson) and my partner Peirre have a high attention to detail and work together with years of experience as a team. Pierre and I maintain a very high standard of cleanliness and attention to each and every one of our customers requirements. As new business owners we know how important first impressions are. It is highest priority to provide a service that satisfies!

Call me or text me any time if you have any interest in transforming the space you live or work in! Check out JAX_FLOORING_OTTAWA on instagram for more visuals too! 

Jackson Hollands 613 291 7819

profile:
Estra Flooring has been serving the Ottawa community with uncompromising quality and exceptional customer service in the flooring industry since 1971. Now in our second generation, we continue to combine old world artisanship with the latest in flooring technology, with a wide variety of styles and products to accommodate a vast spectrum of home and commercial décor.

Our portfolio includes a number of notable and prestigious projects including hardwood flooring at the main function room at Rideau Hall, 24 Sussex Drive, the Rideau Club, the Committee Room on Parliament Hill and all the hardwood flooring at the National Gallery of Canada including the Rideau Street Chapel which has been reassembled there as a permanent exhibit.

Pre-Finished and Unfinished Wood Installation - simple and complex installations.
Sanding and Staining - change the mood and color of your floors, or renew the look of worn out existing hardwood floors.

Screen and Coat - refresh the sheen and the glamour, removes existing finish replaces it for a much cleaner and fresher look.

Our specialties include:

Custom Hardwood including rare & exotic woods,

Solid & Engineered,

Laminates, Cork, Bamboo

Ceramic Tile, Glass Tile

Luxury Vinyl Tile

Carpet and Carpet Tile

Condo (sound absorbent) floors

Sales, Service, Custom Designs, Free on site Estimates.

Residential –  primarily our business comes from our valued residential clients. We offer the utmost in friendly and practical advice, making sure that whatever your budget, we can make your dreams come true.

Commercial – Estra Flooring has maintained special relationships with Ottawa’s most prestigious architects, designers, builders and agencies such as Ottawa Community Housing as a result of our goal to achieve the best result as dictated by our commercial partners' expertise.

From the Rideau Hall to your home, the service we provide is of unparalleled quality.

Please visit our showroom located at 439 Preston Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1S 4N5

Monday through Saturday, Office:  613-233-0149                          

At Estra Flooring the coffee and hospitality is always on!
